title: uche6215
author: uche6215
content: OKX is about to optain SATOSHI CORETo be honest I can't wait to invest in core.Right now I have about 3 CORES but I can't withdraw because it's not lunched yet.I think the same SATOSHI NAKOMOTO who owned Bitcoin also own core as well which means this both coins will be the highest of all.From what I read SATOSHI core will be lunched on the 8th of this month ( February ) and the truth of it is that I will be the most happiest person because I will not sell my coin.If Satoshi core is worth $5000,000,00 and you have about 3 of it, I think you will stop your monthly job and focus on SATOSHI core as well, though it's risky but REWARD COMES AFTER IT. Come to think of it, what if the lunching of core is prospond to some other time?Because it has be prospond severally from the month of November, December and now it's this month January I think it will be prospond as well but I don't want it to prospond. Core DAO should just lunch it.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Post full of lies and false promises. I would avoid this coin as its owners pays for such poor shill focused on unexperienced users without basic knowledge. "stop your monthly job and focus on SATOSHI core" - this has been the worst financial advice in the history of financial advices, maybe ever.

comments.author: MFahad
comments.body: Quote from: uche6215 on February 03, 2023, 10:22:30 AMOKX is about to optain SATOSHI CORE listed in many exchanges like Bitmart,bitget and other exchanges but all in vain. QuoteTo be honest I can't wait to invest in core. how much you have invested ?  please mention the price in which you bought this gem. we want to know how much you have lost in 3 days because it just dumping after listing.QuoteRight now I have about 3 CORES but I can't withdraw because it's not lunched yet. maybe you joined their free mining which was totally free and many big YouTubers made In thousand. your 3 core fan just give you one pizza at this time.QuoteI think the same SATOSHI NAKOMOTO who owned Bitcoin also own core as well which means this both coins will be the highest of all. how shit this paraphrase is. who told you that Satoshi Nakamoto holding this shit coin? QuoteIf Satoshi core is worth $5000,000,00 and you have about 3 of it,  its amazing . this coins dump from 20$ to 2$ and OP is  dreaming 50 M Price, it mean whole world will buy this coin. One of All time shit post Ever i seen in this forum.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: I'm just reading a few lines on your post and I feel some headache thinking of all the shitty statement. You can fraud someone else on social media platforms but you've entered the wrong forum to post your fraud attempt. Enough, this is just a money grabbing project, nothing else.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: uche6215 on February 03, 2023, 10:22:30 AMOKX is about to optain SATOSHI CORETo be honest I can't wait to invest in core.Right now I have about 3 CORES but I can't withdraw because it's not lunched yet.I think the same SATOSHI NAKOMOTO who owned Bitcoin also own core as well which means this both coins will be the highest of all.From what I read SATOSHI core will be lunched on the 8th of this month ( February ) and the truth of it is that I will be the most happiest person because I will not sell my coin.If Satoshi core is worth $5000,000,00 and you have about 3 of it, I think you will stop your monthly job and focus on SATOSHI core as well, though it's risky but REWARD COMES AFTER IT. Come to think of it, what if the lunching of core is prospond to some other time?Because it has be prospond severally from the month of November, December and now it's this month January I think it will be prospond as well but I don't want it to prospond. Core DAO should just lunch it. What are ypu even talking about.  Because someone named this coin Satoshi it means Satoshi owns it lol.  Ypu can't be that much of an idiot to believe that can you?  There is zero need for this coin like a zillion others out there.  Use flash words like Satoshi and core to make it sound like some OG coin or something.  Laughable.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: This is just purely imagination. I hope that you can do proper research of a coin before shilling it on a open forum like this. I remember the one who I can see on facebook regularly shilling this satoshi core on his facebook account. He heavily shills this coins and other non sense coins including pi network to his friend and followers this is why I think he is paid to shill or has a network of affiliates. Imagine how delusional you are just to shill this project. You thinking of making people stop doing their stable job just for this coin. What a non-sense.

comments.author: redsun114
comments.body: Quote from: wheelz1200 on February 11, 2023, 04:40:29 PMWhat are ypu even talking about.  Because someone named this coin Satoshi it means Satoshi owns it lol.  Ypu can't be that much of an idiot to believe that can you?  There is zero need for this coin like a zillion others out there.  Use flash words like Satoshi and core to make it sound like some OG coin or something.  Laughable.My first impression after reading the name is this was just another clone of bitcoin, same to satoshi vision but almost all of them gets a bad reputation so why not this one? There is only one coin which owned by satoshi and that would only be Bitcoin. Take note, Bitcoin only without any other extra names beside it.The rest will only be created by the faketoshis or sometimes called satoshi nakafomo. Creator of this coin is so creative to combine satoshi and core because we all know that satoshi is the dev of the original bitcoin and core or Bitcoin core is one of the famous softwares use in Bitcoin to connect to the Bitcoin network and run a node. - source

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: uche6215 on February 03, 2023, 10:22:30 AMI think you will stop your monthly job and focus on SATOSHI core as well, though it's risky but REWARD COMES AFTER IT. We'll going to be filthy rich if we follow this advice of yours. But honestly, that's not going to happen. These promises that have been said even before never happened in real life. It would be more applicable if it's for bitcoin because that's exceptional.But for projects like this that's promising guaranteed returns and with its marketing that you think that we should stop our jobs, that's already some reddish flag waving.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: You're misleading people to buy scam coin. it's pretty much the same as another scam coin called pi coin. You shall stop being a clown. So many people are still minting this shitty scam coin from their phone. This is another garbage coin. The developer of coin was misleading people by mentioning satoshi. It doesn't even relate to satoshi. Have you quit your real job and how do you feel? I saw that so many people in my countries were losing their sense caused by this stupid coin. They call that themselves would become millionaire instantly when coredao is traded on an exchange site. I guess so many coredao supporters were going to the asylum.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on February 10, 2023, 05:57:42 PMPost full of lies and false promises. I would avoid this coin as its owners pays for such poor shill focused on unexperienced users without basic knowledge. "stop your monthly job and focus on SATOSHI core" - this has been the worst financial advice in the history of financial advices, maybe ever.Investing on ENRON is a close second I think, but joking aside the shilling is getting more desperate and nonsensical, they are trying to appeal to the need people have to believe they can make a lot of money by sitting in front of their computers and do nothing to deserve that money, and while obviously such a proposition may sound attractive very few people have the privilege of reaching such a state, and investing in a scam coin and leaving our job is not going to help at all to achieve that goal.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: The fallacy of the highest order, Satoshi core is not different from all the other fake projects that are copycats and looking for ways to ride on the success of Bitcoin using the name satoshi just to lure potential victims, i advise no one should take any word from this threat seriously.-This project will not be different from all the others such as the Bitcoin satoshi version (BSV) that rip investors of their hard earn money and gives the cryptocurrency market a bad name in the eyes of unknowledgeable newbies who are looking for quick ways to make money from the industry but at the end losing all chasing shadows and empty promises.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I have never seen something or read any news around the forum concerning the core being owned by Satoshi nakamoto, between where do you think you will find him talk less of launching another project called core. Listen very attentively that anyone can impersonate him while trying to gain popularity on their project, as matter of fact nobody knows the way about satoshi and his or her last seen on this forum was around 13th December 2010. Do not invest in a project because it owned by satoshi or being that it will increased in price, take a look at bitcoin is yet to get to $100k so don't just dream CORE would get $500k soon or anytime closer; trade wisely and invest careful.

comments.author: Anonylz
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on February 10, 2023, 05:57:42 PMPost full of lies and false promises. I would avoid this coin as its owners pays for such poor shill focused on unexperienced users without basic knowledge. "stop your monthly job and focus on SATOSHI core" - this has been the worst financial advice in the history of financial advices, maybe ever.And the funny part was the unnecessary hype that was surrounding this core project pre-launched, lol, i remember some guys in one of my local telegram group were so excited about how high the price of core would be, they even started picturing their dream houses and cars  Man, I could not help myself when i saw the price of core at launch, according to them, 'Core is the btc killer' people still believe those type of shit talk in this present time. well, the shilling was already getting on my nerves, glad to see all the core fanboys muted  The future is bright for core no doubt

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Anonylz on March 08, 2023, 06:38:47 PMi remember some guys in one of my local telegram group were so excited about how high the price of core would be, they even started picturing their dream houses and cars  Most of such discussion is paid shilling. There are paid services hiring people with a lot of crypto knowledge to go to various telegram groups to speak about project that pays the most. Be carrefour.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Yeah, shit token.Bitcoin & Satoshi is only one, there is no other. One of the rules investment on crypto never invest on the token/coin who are using "Bitcoin & Satoshi" name ~XD because they used only for marketing purpose.There is no connection and the ended is not the same like Bitcoin, stop make idiot token famous ~XD.

comments.author: pingu39
comments.body: SATOSHI core, another scam project in my opinion.Airdrop token,mining app on phone is all speculation and false promises.And of course you don't know which Twitter profile is the real or which Telegram account,so many fake.I don't understand the story of making a boom out of tokens, a false story, false promises, and in the end the story just goes on and there is no progress.

comments.author: monedauno
comments.body: I do not think that core will go away. At the current rate, Core is worth $5000 for a year. Core is not a long-term coin, and Core is in good position as an investment asset. The only way to buy Core assets is with a stable market. The price of a core is also in good position. So we need some stable supply of Core assets. So the price of a core is stable enough. Core is worth $5000 in a decade. And then you buy Bitcoin if it is cheaper than Core, and you don't have to convert all their resources to Core.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: monedauno on May 10, 2023, 09:28:31 AMI do not think that core will go away. At the current rate, Core is worth $5000 for a year. Core is not a long-term coin, and Core is in good position as an investment asset. The only way to buy Core assets is with a stable market. The price of a core is also in good position. So we need some stable supply of Core assets. So the price of a core is stable enough. Core is worth $5000 in a decade. And then you buy Bitcoin if it is cheaper than Core, and you don't have to convert all their resources to Core.So which one is it? core will worth $500 in a year or a decade?With that kind of soppy, am not so sure it can be that high. right now the price is $0.8, and there is a tendency it will go even lower, yeah because i don't really see that much demand for core nor do i see many project in the ecosystem. So i don't know what you think can push the price up to $500. And don't forget the crypto space keeps evolving and there are other L1 and L2 project coming with very interesting feature and user friendly. So if the demand is less it will end up becoming another forgotten project.
